casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. SMITH
v.
DURKIN 2019-0250 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 8, 2019

O'CONNOR, C.J., and KENNEDY, FISCHER, DEWINE, DONNELLY, and STEWART, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

On respondent's motion to dismiss amended complaint. Motion granted. Relators' amended emergency motion for expedited alternative writ, urgent updated motion for emergency expedited alternative writ, and request for judicial notice denied. Cause dismissed.

FRENCH, J., concurs in part and dissents in part and would grant relators' request for judicial notice.
